overview: The story of WWII U.S. Marine veteran Aldo Giannini who fought in the infamous Battle of Tarawa. Enduring a shrapnel injury and witnessing a staggering 3,250 U.S. casualties, Aldo reflects on a battle which gained the U.S. very little in the war.
tagline: One Marine tells his story to shed light on whether a small island in the Pacific was worth the 5,000 lives it took to take it.
title: Aldo Giannini:  Pacific Theater
